en.ms: The body-fortress is brimful with gold and gems, When Divine wisdom awakens into it, man comes to enshrine love for reality.
en.ssk: The fortress of the body is overflowing with gold and jewels; when it is awakened by spiritual wisdom, one enshrines love for the essence of reality.

en.bdb: The Name of the Lord, Har, Har, is the boat, and the Word of the Guru's Shabad is the boatman, to carry us across.
en.ms: The Lord God's Name is the boat and ship and the Guru's word the boatman, through whom the mortal crosses the world-ocean.
en.ssk: The Name of the Lord, Har, Har, is the boat, and the Word of the Guru's Shabad is the boatman, to carry us across.

es.sn: El Nombre del Señor es el Barco; la Palabra del Shabd del Guru, el Barquero que nos transporta.

en.bdb: The Messenger of Death, the tax collector, does not even come close, and no thieves or robbers can plunder you. ||4||
en.ms: Death's courier, the tax-gatherer, comes not near the Guru's slave and no burglar or thief thieves.
en.ssk: The Messenger of Death, the tax collector, does not even come close, and no thieves or robbers can plunder you. ||4||

en.bdb: I continuously sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord, day and night; singing the Lord's Praises, I cannot find His limits.
en.ms: Day and night I ever sing God's virtues. Uttering the Lord's praises, I find not His limit.
en.ssk: I continuously sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord, day and night; singing the Lord's Praises, I cannot find His limits.

es.sn: Entonces uno canta la Alabanza del Señor por siempre y para siempre.

en.bdb: The mind of the Gurmukh returns to its own home; it meets the Lord of the Universe, to the beat of the celestial drum. ||5||
en.ms: By Guru's grace, the mind comes into its one Home and then it meets with the World Cherisher, with the beat of drum.
en.ssk: The mind of the Gurmukh returns to its own home; it meets the Lord of the Universe, to the beat of the celestial drum. ||5||

es.sn: Por la Gracia del Guru la mente llega hasta su propio Hogar, es entonces cuando uno encuentra, sin lugar a dudas, a Dios.  (5)

transliteration.english: gurmukh manooaa ikat ghar aavai milau guopaal neesaan bajieeaa ||5||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि मनूआ इकतु घरि आवै मिलउ गुोपाल नीसानु बजईआ ॥५॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh manooaa ikat ghar aavai milau guopaal neesaan bajieeaa ||5||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि मनूआ इकतु घरि आवै मिलउ गुोपाल नीसानु बजईआ ॥५॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ mənuəɑ eɪkət̪ Gʰər əɑʋæ mɪlo Gʊɔpɑl nisɑn bəd͡ʒeiɑ.5.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ منُوآ اکت گھر آوَے ملا گُوپال نیِسان بجایآ ۔۔۵۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: nYnI dyiK drsu mnu iqRpqY sRvn bwxI gur sbdu suxeIAw ]
verse.unicode: ਨੈਨੀ ਦੇਖਿ ਦਰਸੁ ਮਨੁ ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤੈ ਸ੍ਰਵਨ ਬਾਣੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣਈਆ ॥

en.bdb: Gazing upon the Blessed Vision of His Darshan with my eyes, my mind is satisfied; with my ears, I listen to the Guru's Bani, and the Word of His Shabad.
en.ms: Seeing the Lord's vision with my eyes my soul is sated and with mine ears, hear I the Guru's hymns and instruction.
en.ssk: Gazing upon the Blessed Vision of His Darshan with my eyes, my mind is satisfied; with my ears, I listen to the Guru's Bani, and the Word of His Shabad.

ss.unicode: ਹੇ ਭਾਈ! ਅੱਖਾਂ ਨਾਲ (ਹਰ ਥਾਂ ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਦਾ) ਦਰਸਨ ਕਰ ਕੇ (ਮੇਰਾ) ਮਨ (ਹੋਰ ਵਾਸਨਾਂ ਵਲੋਂ) ਰੱਜਿਆ ਰਹਿੰਦਾ ਹੈ, (ਮੇਰਾ) ਕੰਨ ਗੁਰੂ ਦੀ ਬਾਣੀ ਗੁਰੂ ਦੇ ਸ਼ਬਦ ਨੂੰ (ਹੀ) ਸੁਣਦੇ ਰਹਿੰਦੇ ਹਨ ।

ms.unicode: ਆਪਣੀਆਂ ਅੱਖਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਦਾ ਦਰਸ਼ਨ ਵੇਖ, ਮੇਰੀ ਆਤਮਾ ਰੱਜ ਗਈ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਆਪਣਿਆਂ ਕੰਨਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਮੈਂ ਗੁਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਬਾਣੀ ਤੇ ਉਪਦੇਸ਼ ਸੁਣਦਾ ਹਾਂ।

es.sn: Mi mente está contenta teniendo Su Visión y con mis oídos escucho la Palabra del Shabd del Guru.

transliteration.english: nainee dhekh dharas man tirapatai sravan baanee gur sabadh sunieeaa ||
transliteration.hindi: नैनी देखि दरसु मनु तृपतै स्रवन बाणी गुर सबदु सुणईआ ॥
transliteration.en: nainee dhekh dharas man tirapatai sravan baanee gur sabadh sunieeaa ||
transliteration.hi: नैनी देखि दरसु मनु तृपतै स्रवन बाणी गुर सबदु सुणईआ ॥
transliteration.ipa: næni d̪ekʰ d̪ərəs mən t̪ɪɹəpət̪æ sɹəʋən bɑɳi Gʊr səbəd̪ sʊɳeiɑ.
transliteration.ur: نَےنیِ دےکھ درس من ترپتَے سرون باݨیِ گُر سبد سُݨایآ ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: suin suin Awqm dyv hY BIny ris ris rwm gopwl rveIAw ]6]
verse.unicode: ਸੁਨਿ ਸੁਨਿ ਆਤਮ ਦੇਵ ਹੈ ਭੀਨੇ ਰਸਿ ਰਸਿ ਰਾਮ ਗੋਪਾਲ ਰਵਈਆ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: Listening, listening, my soul is softened, delighted by His subtle essence, chanting the Name of the Lord of the Universe. ||6||
en.ms: Continually hearing the Guru's word, the human soul is softened and delighted with the Lord's elixir and utters the Master's Name.
en.ssk: Listening, listening, my soul is softened, delighted by His subtle essence, chanting the Name of the Lord of the Universe. ||6||

es.sn: Escuchándola, mi ser se imbuye en Ella y entonces con todo mi amor alabo al Señor. (6)

transliteration.english: sun sun aatam dhev hai bheene ras ras raam gopaal ravieeaa ||6||
transliteration.hindi: सुनि सुनि आतम देव है भीने रसि रसि राम गोपाल रवईआ ॥६॥
transliteration.en: sun sun aatam dhev hai bheene ras ras raam gopaal ravieeaa ||6||

transliteration.ur: سُن سُن آتم دےو هَے بھیٍنے رس رسِ رام گوپال روایآ ۔۔۶۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: qRY gux mwieAw moih ivAwpy qurIAw guxu hY gurmuiK lhIAw ]
verse.unicode: ਤ੍ਰੈ ਗੁਣ ਮਾਇਆ ਮੋਹਿ ਵਿਆਪੇ ਤੁਰੀਆ ਗੁਣੁ ਹੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਲਹੀਆ ॥

en.bdb: In the grip of the three qualities, they are engrossed in love and attachment to Maya; only as Gurmukh do they find the absolute quality, absorption in bliss.
en.ms: Men of three qualities are engrossed in the love of mammon. It is through the Guru, that man attains to the supreme status.
en.ssk: In the grip of the three qualities, they are engrossed in love and attachment to Maya; only as Gurmukh do they find the absolute quality, absorption in bliss.

es.sn: En las garras de las tres Gunas uno se envuelve en Maya, pero por la Gracia del Guru uno es entonado en el Estado Supremo de Éxtasis.

transliteration.english: trai gun maiaa moh viaape tureeaa gun hai gurmukh laheeaa ||

transliteration.en: trai gun maiaa moh viaape tureeaa gun hai gurmukh laheeaa ||

transliteration.ipa: t̪ɹæ Gʊɳ mɑɪɑ mɔh ʋɪəɑpe t̪ʊriəɑ Gʊɳ hæ Gʊrəmʊkʰ ləhiəɑ.

verse.gurmukhi: eyk idRsit sB sm kir jwxY ndrI AwvY sBu bRhmu psreIAw ]7]
verse.unicode: ਏਕ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਸਭ ਸਮ ਕਰਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਨਦਰੀ ਆਵੈ ਸਭੁ ਬ੍ਰਹਮੁ ਪਸਰਈਆ ॥੭॥

en.bdb: With a single, impartial eye, look upon all alike, and see God pervading all. ||7||
en.ms: With the same one eye, he deems all alike and sees the Supreme Lord pervading all.
en.ssk: With a single, impartial eye, look upon all alike, and see God pervading all. ||7||

en.bdb: Joining the Society of the Saints, I have obtained the supreme status. I am just a castor-oil tree, made fragrant by their association. ||1||
en.ms: Joining the society of saints, I have obtained the supreme status. Meeting with God, I who was like the castor-oil plant and buteafrondosa tree, have become sweetly scented.
en.ssk: Joining the Society of the Saints, I have obtained the supreme status. I am just a castor-oil tree, made fragrant by their association. ||1||

en.bdb: Of all plants, the sandalwood tree is the most sublime. Everything near the sandalwood tree becomes fragrant like sandalwood.
en.ms: In the entire vegetation, the sandal tree is the most sublime. All that is near the sandal tree becomes fragrant like sandal.
en.ssk: Of all plants, the sandalwood tree is the most sublime. Everything near the sandalwood tree becomes fragrant like sandalwood.

en.bdb: The treasure of jewels is found in the ocean of the Guru's Teachings. The treasure of devotional worship is opened to me.
en.ms: In the ocean of the Guru's instruction, find I the jewel like wealth of the Lord's Name and the treasure of His meditation is opened unto me.
en.ssk: The treasure of jewels is found in the ocean of the Guru's Teachings. The treasure of devotional worship is opened to me.

es.sn: En el Mar de la Palabra del Shabd del Guru encuentro la Joya del Nombre del Señor, y el Tesoro de  Devoción me es mostrado.

verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਚਰਣੀ ਇਕ ਸਰਧਾ ਉਪਜੀ ਮੈ ਹਰਿ ਗੁਣ ਕਹਤੇ ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤਿ ਨ ਭਈਆ ॥੪॥

en.bdb: Focused on the Guru's Feet, faith wells up within me; chanting the Glorious Praises of the Lord, I hunger for more. ||4||
en.ms: Adoring Guru's feet, faith has welled up in me, Uttering the Lord's praise my hunger for it is appeased not.
en.ssk: Focused on the Guru's Feet, faith wells up within me; chanting the Glorious Praises of the Lord, I hunger for more. ||4||

es.sn: La Fe es edificada en mí al estar entonado a los Pies del Guru, yo recito la Alabanza Inexhausta del Señor por siempre y para siempre. (4)

verse.unicode: ਪਰਮ ਬੈਰਾਗੁ ਨਿਤ ਨਿਤ ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਏ ਮੈ ਹਰਿ ਗੁਣ ਕਹਤੇ ਭਾਵਨੀ ਕਹੀਆ ॥

en.bdb: I am totally detached, continually, continuously meditating on the Lord; chanting the Glorious Praises of the Lord, I express my love for Him.
en.ms: Ever, ever on contemplating my Lord, ever contemplating on my Lord, supreme detachedness has welled up in me. I express my love by uttering God's praise love.
en.ssk: I am totally detached, continually, continuously meditating on the Lord; chanting the Glorious Praises of the Lord, I express my love for Him.

es.sn: Meditando en Dios soy bendecido con el desapego supremo; sí, y recitando Su Alabanza me lleno de Fe.

verse.unicode: ਬਾਰ ਬਾਰ ਖਿਨੁ ਖਿਨੁ ਪਲੁ ਕਹੀਐ ਹਰਿ ਪਾਰੁ ਨ ਪਾਵੈ ਪਰੈ ਪਰਈਆ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: Time and time again, each and every moment and instant, I express it. I cannot find the Lord's limits; He is the farthest of the far. ||5||
en.ms: Uttering His praise over and over again and every moment and trice, one can find not God's limit. He is the remotest of the remote.
en.ssk: Time and time again, each and every moment and instant, I express it. I cannot find the Lord's limits; He is the farthest of the far. ||5||

es.sn: Recito y recito Su Alabanza sin conocer los Límites de Dios, pues Él es Insoldable e Infinito. (5)

en.bdb: The Shaastras, the Vedas and the Puraanas advise righteous actions, and the performance of the six religious rituals.
en.ms: The Shastras, the Vedas and the Puranas proclaim the doing of good deeds and steadfastly performing the six religious rites.
en.ssk: The Shaastras, the Vedas and the Puraanas advise righteous actions, and the performance of the six religious rituals.

verse.unicode: ਮਨਮੁਖ ਪਾਖੰਡਿ ਭਰਮਿ ਵਿਗੂਤੇ ਲੋਭ ਲਹਰਿ ਨਾਵ ਭਾਰਿ ਬੁਡਈਆ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: The hypocritical, self-willed manmukhs are ruined by doubt; in the waves of greed, their boat is heavily loaded, and it sinks. ||6||
en.ms: The perverse hypocrites rites. The perverse hypocrites are ruined in doubt. Their boat is heavily Loaded with sins and sinks in the tides of avarice contemplate.
en.ssk: The hypocritical, self-willed manmukhs are ruined by doubt; in the waves of greed, their boat is heavily loaded, and it sinks. ||6||

en.bdb: So chant the Naam, the Name of the Lord, and through the Naam, find emancipation. The Simritees and Shaastras recommend the Naam.
en.ms: Thou the Name and through the Name be blessed with emancipation. The Simirtis and Shashtras impress the Name's meditation.
en.ssk: So chant the Naam, the Name of the Lord, and through the Naam, find emancipation. The Simritees and Shaastras recommend the Naam.

verse.unicode: ਹਉਮੈ ਜਾਇ ਤ ਨਿਰਮਲੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਰਚੈ ਪਰਮ ਪਦੁ ਪਈਆ ॥੭॥

en.bdb: Eradicating egotism, one becomes pure. The Gurmukh is inspired, and obtains the supreme status. ||7||
en.ms: If man stills his ego and by Guru's grace imbibes Lord's love, then he becomes pure and obtains the supreme status.
en.ssk: Eradicating egotism, one becomes pure. The Gurmukh is inspired, and obtains the supreme status. ||7||

es.sn: En la granja del cuerpo deben crecer buenas acciones; los hombres de Dios las cultivan para encontrar la Esencia de Dios.

en.bdb: The priceless jewel of the Naam becomes manifest, and it pours into their vessels of love. ||2||
en.ms: The invaluable jewel of the Name becomes manifest and it pours into their vessel of love.
en.ssk: The priceless jewel of the Naam becomes manifest, and it pours into their vessels of love. ||2||

es.sn: En ellas se encuentra la Iluminación del Nombre del Señor y se recolectan en los silos del Amor. (2)

en.bdb: Become the slave of the slave of the slave, of that humble being who has become the devotee of the Lord.
en.ms: The person, who has become the Lord's own servant; Be thou the slave of the slave of his slave.
en.ssk: Become the slave of the slave of the slave, of that humble being who has become the devotee of the Lord.

es.sn: Mi añoranza es ser el Esclavo de los Esclavos de Aquél que se ha vuelto el Devoto de Dios.

en.bdb: I dedicate my mind and intellect, and place them in offering before my Guru; by Guru's Grace, I speak the Unspoken. ||3||
en.ms: Dedicating my soul and intellect, I place them before the Guru. By Guru's grace I utter the Unutterable One.
en.ssk: I dedicate my mind and intellect, and place them in offering before my Guru; by Guru's Grace, I speak the Unspoken. ||3||

es.sn: Ante tal Santo entrego mi mente y mi intelecto, y por la Gracia del Guru recito la Verdad Inexplicable. (3)

en.bdb: The self-willed manmukhs are engrossed in attachment to Maya; their minds are thirsty, burning with desire.
en.ms: The way-ward are engrossed in the love of worldly valuables. Their soul is thirsty and burns in desire.
en.ssk: The self-willed manmukhs are engrossed in attachment to Maya; their minds are thirsty, burning with desire.

ms.unicode: ਆਪ-ਹੁਦਰੇ ਸੰਸਾਰੀ ਪਦਾਰਥਾਂ ਦੀ ਲਗਨ ਅੰਦਰ ਖਚਤ ਹੋਏ ਹੋਏ ਹਨ। ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਇਹ ਆਤਮਾ ਪਿਆਸੀ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਖਾਹਿਸ਼ ਅੰਦਰ ਸੜ ਜਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ।

es.sn: El ególatra está involucrado en Maya y en su infatuación; su mente está siempre nerviosa y sedienta.

transliteration.english: manmukh maiaa moh viaape ih man tirasanaa jalat tikhieeaa ||
transliteration.hindi: मनमुख माइआ मोहि विआपे इहु मनु तृसना जलत तिखईआ ॥
transliteration.en: manmukh maiaa moh viaape ih man tirasanaa jalat tikhieeaa ||
transliteration.hi: मनमुख माइआ मोहि विआपे इहु मनु तृसना जलत तिखईआ ॥
transliteration.ipa: mənəmʊkʰ mɑɪɑ mɔh ʋɪəɑpe eɪh mən t̪ɪɹəsənɑ d͡ʒələt̪ t̪ɪkʰeiɑ.
transliteration.ur: منمکھ ماایا موه وآپے اهُ من ترسنا جلت تکھایآ ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmiq nwmu AMimRq jlu pwieAw Agin buJI gur sbid buJeIAw ]4]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਜਲੁ ਪਾਇਆ ਅਗਨਿ ਬੁਝੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦਿ ਬੁਝਈਆ ॥੪॥

en.bdb: Following the Guru's Teachings, I have obtained the Ambrosial Water of the Naam, and the fire has been put out. The Word of the Guru's Shabad has put it out. ||4||
en.ms: By Guru's instruction I have received the ambrosial water of the Lord's Name and my fire is quenched. The Transcendent Name has quenched it.
en.ssk: Following the Guru's Teachings, I have obtained the Ambrosial Water of the Naam, and the fire has been put out. The Word of the Guru's Shabad has put it out. ||4||

es.sn: Por medio de la Sabiduría del Guru he recibido el Néctar del Nombre del Señor; con su Palabra mi fuego interior ha sido extinguido.

verse.gurmukhi: iehu mnu nwcY siqgur AwgY Anhd sbd Duin qUr vjeIAw ]
verse.unicode: ਇਹੁ ਮਨੁ ਨਾਚੈ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਆਗੈ ਅਨਹਦ ਸਬਦ ਧੁਨਿ ਤੂਰ ਵਜਈਆ ॥

en.bdb: This mind dances before the True Guru. The unstruck sound current of the Shabad resounds, vibrating the celestial melody.
en.ms: This soul of mine dances before the True Guru and within me resounds the Tune of the celestial music of the Name.
en.ssk: This mind dances before the True Guru. The unstruck sound current of the Shabad resounds, vibrating the celestial melody.

es.sn: Ahora mi mente danza frente al Guru, la permanente Corriente de Sonido del Shabd resuena, haciendo vibrar la Melodía Divina.

transliteration.ur: ِاهُ من ناچَے ستگر آگَے انهد سبد دھُن تُور وجایآ ۔۔

en.bdb: I praise the Lord, day and night, moving my feet to the beat of the drum. ||5||
en.ms: Placing, placing my feet with the beating of time, day and night sing I the praise of the Lord Master God.
en.ssk: I praise the Lord, day and night, moving my feet to the beat of the drum. ||5||

es.sn: Alabo al Señor noche y día, moviendo mis pies al ritmo del tambor.(5)

en.bdb: Imbued with the Lord's Love, my mind sings His Praise, joyfully chanting the Shabad, the source of nectar and bliss.
en.ms: Imbued with God's love, my soul sings His praise and joyfully utters the Name of the Home of Nectar and bliss.
en.ssk: Imbued with the Lord's Love, my mind sings His Praise, joyfully chanting the Shabad, the source of nectar and bliss.

en.bdb: The stream of immaculate purity flows through the home of the self within; one who drinks it in, finds peace. ||6||
en.ms: Within one's own home trickles the supremely immaculate stream, He who drink it attains to peace.
en.ssk: The stream of immaculate purity flows through the home of the self within; one who drinks it in, finds peace. ||6||

en.bdb: The stubborn-minded, egotistical, proud-minded person performs rituals, but these are like sand castles built by children.
en.ms: Through his mind's obstinacy, the proud man performs rituals, but these are like house of sand built by a child.
en.ssk: The stubborn-minded, egotistical, proud-minded person performs rituals, but these are like sand castles built by children.

en.bdb: When the waves of the ocean come in, they crumble and dissolve in an instant. ||7||
en.ms: When the waves of the vast ocean dash against it, in an instant, it crumbles into pieces and bits.
en.ssk: When the waves of the ocean come in, they crumble and dissolve in an instant. ||7||

verse.unicode: ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤਿ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਮਨਿ ਸਾਂਤਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਾਧੂ ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤਿ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਪਈਆ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: Satisfaction, contentment and tranquility do not come to their minds; but meeting the Holy Saints, they are satisfied, and through the Name of the Lord, spiritual perfection is attained. ||5||
en.ms: Satiation, contentment and peace enter not man's mind By meeting the saints, man is sated and by God's Name, he procures perfection.
en.ssk: Satisfaction, contentment and tranquility do not come to their minds; but meeting the Holy Saints, they are satisfied, and through the Name of the Lord, spiritual perfection is attained. ||5||

en.bdb: Life is born from the egg, from the womb, from sweat and from the earth; God created the beings and creatures of all colors and forms.
en.ms: Egg-born, foetus-born, sweat-born, earth-born, the mortals and the creatures of all the colours and forms are made by God.
en.ssk: Life is born from the egg, from the womb, from sweat and from the earth; God created the beings and creatures of all colors and forms.

en.bdb: I have made the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, my necklace; my mind tinged with devotion is the intricate ornament of crowning glory.
en.ms: The Lord's name, I have made my Necklace and the love-filled mind is the supreme ornament for my head decoration.
en.ssk: I have made the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, my necklace; my mind tinged with devotion is the intricate ornament of crowning glory.

en.bdb: I have spread out my bed of faith in the Lord, Har, Har. I cannot abandon Him - my mind is filled with such a great love for Him. ||6||
en.ms: For my Lord Master I have spread the bedding of faith. I can abandon not my Lord, as within my mind there is immense affection for Him.
en.ssk: I have spread out my bed of faith in the Lord, Har, Har. I cannot abandon Him - my mind is filled with such a great love for Him. ||6||

en.bdb: If God says one thing, and the soul-bride does something else, then all her decorations are useless and false.
en.ms: If the Lord says one thing and the bride does quite another, then vain and refuse-like are all her decorations.
en.ssk: If God says one thing, and the soul-bride does something else, then all her decorations are useless and false.

es.sn: Si el Señor dice una cosa y nosotros hacemos otra, mostramos que todos nuestros adornos son ilusorios.

en.bdb: She may adorn herself to meet her Husband Lord, but still, only the virtuous soul-bride meets God, and the other's face is spat upon. ||7||
en.ms: The bride bedecks herself to meet with her Spouse, but the chaste brides obtain the Lord and her face is spat at.
en.ssk: She may adorn herself to meet her Husband Lord, but still, only the virtuous soul-bride meets God, and the other's face is spat upon. ||7||

en.ms: Seeing the Guru, my mind's yearning is fulfilled, as the pied-cuckoo is pacified, when after plaintive cry, the rain.-drop falls into its mouth.
en.ssk: Gazing upon the Guru, my mind's faith is fulfilled, like the song-bird, which cries and cries, until the rain-drop falls into its mouth. ||1||

en.ssk: After being separated from the Lord for countless incarnations, I am re-united with Him, entering the Sanctuary of the True, True, True Guru. ||4||

en.bdb: There is one bed for the soul-bride, and the same bed for God, her Lord and Master. The self-willed manmukh does not obtain the Mansion of the Lord's Presence; she wanders around, in limbo.
en.ms: The same is the couch for the soul and the Spouse and the same is the Lord master of all. An apostate mounts not to his Master's mansion and wanders about.
en.ssk: There is one bed for the soul-bride, and the same bed for God, her Lord and Master. The self-willed manmukh does not obtain the Mansion of the Lord's Presence; she wanders around, in limbo.

en.bdb: Because of devotional worship in my past incarnations, I have been born into this life. The Guru has inspired me to worship the Lord, Har, Har, Har, Har.
en.ms: By virtue of the worship done in past lives, I am born human, The Guru has installed in me the Lord, Lord, Lord's meditation.
en.ssk: Because of devotional worship in my past incarnations, I have been born into this life. The Guru has inspired me to worship the Lord, Har, Har, Har, Har.

en.ms: When I merged in the Lord, Lord, Lord, 's Name, then serving and praising the Lord, I attained to Him.

ss.unicode: (ਪਰ, ਹੇ ਭਾਈ! ਪਰਮਾਤਮਾ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨਾ ਜੀਵ ਦੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਇਖ਼ਤਿਆਰ ਦੀ ਗੱਲ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ । ਇਹ ਘਾਲ-ਕਮਾਈ ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਦੀ ਮਿਹਰ ਨਾਲ ਹੀ ਹੋ ਸਕਦੀ ਹੈ । ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨੀ, ਮਾਨੋ, ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਪੀਸਣ ਸਮਾਨ ਹੈ । ਇਸਤ੍ਰੀ ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਪੀਂਹਦੀ ਹੈ, ਆਪ ਹੀ ਘਸਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ, ਤੇ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਆਪਣੇ ਹੱਥਾਂ-ਪੈਰਾਂ ਤੇ ਲਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ । ਉਹ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਇਸ ਯੋਗ ਬਣਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਉਸ ਇਸਤ੍ਰੀ ਦੇ ਅੰਗਾਂ ਤੇ ਲੱਗ ਸਕੇ) । ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਨੇ ਆਪ ਹੀ (ਜੀਵ ਦੇ ਮਨ ਨੂੰ ਆਪਣੇ ਚਰਨਾਂ ਵਿਚ) ਲਿਆ ਲਿਆ ਕੇ (ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨ ਦੀ) ਮਹਿੰਦੀ (ਜੀਵ ਪਾਸੋਂ) ਪਿਹਾਈ ਹੈ, ਫਿਰ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ-ਰੂਪ ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਘੋਲ ਘੋਲ ਕੇ (ਰੰਗੀਲੀ ਪਿਆਰ-ਭਰੀ ਬਣਾ ਬਣਾ ਕੇ) ਆਪਣੇ ਚਰਨਾਂ ਵਿਚ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਜੋੜਿਆ ਹੈ ।

bdb.unicode: (ਪਰ, ਹੇ ਭਾਈ! ਪਰਮਾਤਮਾ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨਾ ਜੀਵ ਦੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਇਖ਼ਤਿਆਰ ਦੀ ਗੱਲ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ । ਇਹ ਘਾਲ-ਕਮਾਈ ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਦੀ ਮਿਹਰ ਨਾਲ ਹੀ ਹੋ ਸਕਦੀ ਹੈ । ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨੀ, ਮਾਨੋ, ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਪੀਸਣ ਸਮਾਨ ਹੈ । ਇਸਤ੍ਰੀ ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਪੀਂਹਦੀ ਹੈ, ਆਪ ਹੀ ਘਸਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ, ਤੇ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਆਪਣੇ ਹੱਥਾਂ-ਪੈਰਾਂ ਤੇ ਲਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ । ਉਹ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਇਸ ਯੋਗ ਬਣਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਉਸ ਇਸਤ੍ਰੀ ਦੇ ਅੰਗਾਂ ਤੇ ਲੱਗ ਸਕੇ) । ਪ੍ਰਭੂ ਨੇ ਆਪ ਹੀ (ਜੀਵ ਦੇ ਮਨ ਨੂੰ ਆਪਣੇ ਚਰਨਾਂ ਵਿਚ) ਲਿਆ ਲਿਆ ਕੇ (ਭਗਤੀ ਕਰਨ ਦੀ) ਮਹਿੰਦੀ (ਜੀਵ ਪਾਸੋਂ) ਪਿਹਾਈ ਹੈ, ਫਿਰ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਭਗਤੀ-ਰੂਪ ਮਹਿੰਦੀ ਨੂੰ ਘੋਲ ਘੋਲ ਕੇ (ਰੰਗੀਲੀ ਪਿਆਰ-ਭਰੀ ਬਣਾ ਬਣਾ ਕੇ) ਆਪਣੇ ਚਰਨਾਂ ਵਿਚ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਜੋੜਿਆ ਹੈ ।

en.bdb: Through the Name, my awareness extends in the ten directions; the fragrance of the fragrant Lord permeates the air. ||1||
en.ms: Through the Name, I have obtained the knowledge of ten directions and I now realise the Fragrant Lord is perfuming all.
en.ssk: Through the Name, my awareness extends in the ten directions; the fragrance of the fragrant Lord permeates the air. ||1||

en.bdb: Your unlimited sermon is the most sweet sermon; I contemplate the most Sublime Word of the Guru.
en.ms: My Master, the Guru's sublime Gurbani, is Thine discourse of detachedness and sweet discourse and I reflect thereon.
en.ssk: Your unlimited sermon is the most sweet sermon; I contemplate the most Sublime Word of the Guru.

en.bdb: Singing, singing, I sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord; singing His Glorious Praises, the Guru saves me. ||2||
en.ms: Sing, sing and hymn I the Lord's praise. By hymning the Lord's praise, the Guru emancipates the mortal.
en.ssk: Singing, singing, I sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord; singing His Glorious Praises, the Guru saves me. ||2||

en.ms: The Guru is discriminating and the Guru looks upon all alike. Meeting with him, the mortal's doubt is dispelled.
en.ssk: The Guru is wise and clear; the Guru looks upon all alike. Meeting with Him, doubt and skepticism are removed.

es.sn: El Guru no discrimina y nos mira a todos igual; encontrándolo nuestras dudas desaparecen.

en.ssk: Meeting with the True Guru, I have obtained the supreme status. I am a sacrifice to the True Guru. ||3||

es.sn: Sí, encontrando al Guru, uno logra el Estado Sublime de Éxtasis; oh, ofrezco mi ser en sacrificio al Guru.(3)

en.bdb: Practicing hypocrisy and deception, people wander around in confusion. Greed and hypocrisy are evils in this world.
en.ms: People wander about practising hypocrisy and deception. Evil are avarice and hypocrisy in this world.
en.ssk: Practicing hypocrisy and deception, people wander around in confusion. Greed and hypocrisy are evils in this world.

en.bdb: In this world and the next, they are miserable; the Messenger of Death hovers over their heads, and strikes them down. ||4||
en.ms: In this world and the yonder one, They become miserable and standing over their head, the Death's courier smites them.
en.ssk: In this world and the next, they are miserable; the Messenger of Death hovers over their heads, and strikes them down. ||4||

en.bdb: The virtues of the Sangat, the Holy Congregation, are so very great. Even the prostitute was saved, by teaching the parrot to speak the Lord's Name.
en.ms: The advantage of the holy company is very great. The whore was emancipated by teaching the parrot to utter the Lord's Name.
en.ssk: The virtues of the Sangat, the Holy Congregation, are so very great. Even the prostitute was saved, by teaching the parrot to speak the Lord's Name.

en.bdb: My mind loves the dust of the feet of the humble; the Lord emancipates those who meet with the Lord's humble servants. ||5||
en.ms: My mind loves the dust of the feet of the saintly persons. The Lord God emancipates the mortals, who associates with His slaves.
en.ssk: My mind loves the dust of the feet of the humble; the Lord emancipates those who meet with the Lord's humble servants. ||5||

es.sn: Cuando amas el Polvo de los Pies de los Santos y habitas con ellos, el Señor te emancipa. (5)

en.bdb: From village to village, throughout all the cities I wandered; and then, inspired by the Lord's humble servants, I found Him deep within the nucleus of my heart.
en.ms: I wandered from village to village and through all the cities, but through the Lord's slaves I found God in my very mind.
en.ssk: From village to village, throughout all the cities I wandered; and then, inspired by the Lord's humble servants, I found Him deep within the nucleus of my heart.

es.sn: He viajado mucho por villas y ciudades, pero los Santos me revelaron a Dios desde mi interior.

en.bdb: Faith and longing have welled up within me, and I have been blended with the Lord; the Guru, the Guru, has saved me. ||6||
en.ms: Faith and confidence have welled up within me and the Great Guru-God has emancipated and blended me with the Lord.
en.ssk: Faith and longing have welled up within me, and I have been blended with the Lord; the Guru, the Guru, has saved me. ||6||

en.bdb: The thread of my breath has been made totally sublime and pure; I contemplate the Shabad, the Word of the True Guru.
en.ms: The entire lineage of my breaths the True Guru has rendered sublime and I now reflect over the Name.
en.ssk: The thread of my breath has been made totally sublime and pure; I contemplate the Shabad, the Word of the True Guru.

es.sn: El hilo de mi respiración, el Guru lo limpió volviéndolo sublime, y así es como habité en la Palabra del Guru, penetré en mi ser y probé el Néctar del Señor.

en.bdb: I came back to the home of my own inner self; drinking in the ambrosial essence, I see the world, without my eyes. ||7||

en.ms: Hearing the Guru's word, my mind has become tender and imbued with it, this mind has returned to its own home.

en.ssk: Singing the Name of the One Lord each and every instant, and following the Guru's Teachings, the mind is absorbed in the Naam.

en.bdb: But without the Naam, they are all bland and insipid. They are born, only to die again, in the cycle of reincarnation. ||5||
en.ms: but without the Lord's Name, they are all insipid and vain and he shall continue the cycle of birth and death.
en.ssk: But without the Naam, they are all bland and insipid. They are born, only to die again, in the cycle of reincarnation. ||5||

en.ms: Mammon veil is a great veil and through it, man lands in the whirlpool of desire, wherein his home is destroyed.
en.ssk: The veil of Maya is a thick and heavy veil, a whirlpool which destroys one's home.

verse.unicode: ਪਾਪ ਬਿਕਾਰ ਮਨੂਰ ਸਭਿ ਭਾਰੇ ਬਿਖੁ ਦੁਤਰੁ ਤਰਿਓ ਨ ਜਾਵੈਗੋ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: Sins and corrupt vices are totally heavy, like rusted slag. They will not let you cross over the poisonous and treacherous world-ocean. ||6||
en.ms: All the sins and vices are heavy like the rusted iron and with them the poisonous and arduous world ocean can be crossed not.
en.ssk: Sins and corrupt vices are totally heavy, like rusted slag. They will not let you cross over the poisonous and treacherous world-ocean. ||6||

en.bdb: Let the Fear of God and neutral detachment be the boat; the Guru is the Boatman, who carries us across in the Word of the Shabad.
en.ms: God's fear and love are the ship and the Guru the helmsman, who ferries man across with the help of Lord's Name.
en.ssk: Let the Fear of God and neutral detachment be the boat; the Guru is the Boatman, who carries us across in the Word of the Shabad.

en.ms: Attached to ignorance, man is lulled to sleep and, yoking him to gnosis, the Guru awakens him.

en.ms: Join thou the saints society, company of the divine oriented, for, meeting with the saints society, thou shall be blessed with the Lord's Name elixir.
en.ssk: Joining the Society of the Saints, joining the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, you shall come to receive the Sublime Essence of the Lord.

en.bdb: But not joining the Sangat, and committing actions in egotistical pride, is like drawing out clean water, and throwing it in the mud. ||3||
en.ms: Whosoever associates not with the saints and does deeds of ego, he is like a person, who draws out water and throws it in mud.
en.ssk: But not joining the Sangat, and committing actions in egotistical pride, is like drawing out clean water, and throwing it in the mud. ||3||

en.ms: God is the Protector of the saintly persons and God's name elixir tastes sweet to the saints.
en.ssk: The Lord is the Protector and Saving Grace of His humble devotees. The Lord's Sublime Essence seems so sweet to these humble beings.

en.ms: Them, the Lord blessed with glory every moment and, through the True Guru's instruction, they merge in Him.

en.bdb: Do not be fooled by appearances of high and low social class. Suk Dayv bowed at the feet of Janak, and meditated.
en.ms: Be thou not misled seeing the high and low caste, Sukhdev, the Brahman, contemplated his Lord repairing to the feet of Janak, the Khashtri.
en.ssk: Do not be fooled by appearances of high and low social class. Suk Dayv bowed at the feet of Janak, and meditated.

en.bdb: Even though Janak threw his left-overs and garbage on Suk Dayv's head, his mind did not waver, even for an instant. ||7||
en.ms: The left-over of the leafy plates fell over his head, but his mind wavered not even a bit and trice.
en.ssk: Even though Janak threw his left-overs and garbage on Suk Dayv's head, his mind did not waver, even for an instant. ||7||

es.sn: Eres totalmente Insondable, Inaccesible e Infinito. Mediante la Sabiduría de la Enseñanza del Guru, la mente encuentra su estabilidad y balance. (1)

verse.unicode: ਜਿਨ ਤੂ ਜਪਿਓ ਤੇਈ ਜਨ ਨੀਕੇ ਹਰਿ ਜਪਤਿਅਹੁ ਕਉ ਸੁਖੁ ਪਾਵੈਗੋ ॥

en.bdb: Those humble beings who meditate on You are noble and exalted. Meditating on the Lord, they are at peace.
en.ms: They who ponder over Thee, O Lord, sublime are those persons. whosoever contemplates his God, is blessed with peace.
en.ssk: Those humble beings who meditate on You are noble and exalted. Meditating on the Lord, they are at peace.

ss.unicode: ਹੇ ਪ੍ਰਭੂ! ਜਿਹੜੇ ਮਨੁੱਖਾਂ ਨੇ ਤੈਨੂੰ ਜਪਿਆ ਹੈ, ਉਹੀ ਮਨੁੱਖ ਚੰਗੇ (ਜੀਵਨ ਵਾਲੇ) ਬਣੇ ਹਨ । ਹੇ ਭਾਈ! ਨਾਮ ਜਪਣ ਵਾਲਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਹਰੀ (ਆਤਮਕ) ਆਨੰਦ ਬਖ਼ਸ਼ਦਾ ਹੈ ।

es.sn: Esos seres humildes que meditan en Ti, son nobles y excelsos, y meditando en Dios están en Paz.

transliteration.hindi: जिन तू जपिओ तेई जन नीके हरि जपतिअहु कउ सुखु पावैगो ॥
transliteration.en: jin too japio teiee jan neeke har japatiahu kau sukh paavaigo ||

verse.unicode: ਬਿਦਰ ਦਾਸੀ ਸੁਤੁ ਛੋਕ ਛੋਹਰਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਸਨੁ ਅੰਕਿ ਗਲਿ ਲਾਵੈਗੋ ॥੨॥

en.bdb: Bidur, the son of a slave-girl, was an untouchable, but Krishna hugged him close in His Embrace. ||2||
en.ms: Krishan hugged to his heart and bosom Bidur, and untouchable lad, the son of a hand-maiden.
en.ssk: Bidur, the son of a slave-girl, was an untouchable, but Krishna hugged him close in His Embrace. ||2||

ss.unicode: (ਵੇਖੋ, ਇਕ) ਦਾਸੀ ਦਾ ਪੁੱਤਰ ਬਿਦਰ ਛੋਕਰਾ ਜਿਹਾ ਹੀ ਸੀ, (ਪਰ ਨਾਮ ਜਪਣ ਦੀ ਬਰਕਤਿ ਨਾਲ) ਕ੍ਰਿਸਨ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਛਾਤੀ ਨਾਲ ਲਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ, ਗਲ ਨਾਲ ਲਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ ।੨।

es.sn: Bidur, el hijo de la esclava, era un intocable, pero Krishna lo tomó en su pecho y lo abrazó. (2)

en.bdb: Wood is produced from water, but by holding onto wood, one is saved from drowning.
en.ms: The wood is produced from water, so, taking the side of wood, the water drowns it not.
en.ssk: Wood is produced from water, but by holding onto wood, one is saved from drowning.

es.sn: La madera es producida del agua, pero aferrándose a la madera uno no se ahoga.

en.bdb: The Lord Himself embellishes and exalts His humble servants; He confirms His Innate Nature. ||3||
en.ms: Of Himself, the Lord God embellishes His slaves and upholds His innate nature.
en.ssk: The Lord Himself embellishes and exalts His humble servants; He confirms His Innate Nature. ||3||

es.sn: Quienes viven entonados en el Amor del Señor, permanecen balanceados y desapegados para siempre. Viven cerca del Señor quienes llegan a sus hogares.

en.bdb: If I am blessed with the dust of their feet, then I live. Granting His Grace, He Himself bestows it. ||1||
en.ms: If I am blessed with the dust of their feet, then alone can I live, Showering His benediction, the Lord, of Himself blesses me with it.
en.ssk: If I am blessed with the dust of their feet, then I live. Granting His Grace, He Himself bestows it. ||1||

en.bdb: Mortal beings are attached to greed and duality. Their minds are unripe and unfit, and will not accept the Dye of His Love.
en.ms: The mortals are attached to duality and avarice, Their uncultured mind takes not the Lord's colour.
en.ssk: Mortal beings are attached to greed and duality. Their minds are unripe and unfit, and will not accept the Dye of His Love.

verse.unicode: ਫਿਰਿ ਉਲਟਿਓ ਜਨਮੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਗੁਰ ਬਚਨੀ ਗੁਰੁ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਰੰਗੁ ਲਾਵੈਗੋ ॥੨॥

en.bdb: But their lives are transformed through the Word of the Guru's Teachings. Meeting with the Guru, the Primal Being, they are dyed in the color of His Love. ||2||
en.ms: By the Guru's instruction, man's way of life is changed and meeting with the Omnipotent Guru, he is imbued with the Lord's love.
en.ssk: But their lives are transformed through the Word of the Guru's Teachings. Meeting with the Guru, the Primal Being, they are dyed in the color of His Love. ||2||

en.ssk: There are ten organs of sense and action; the ten wander unrestrained. Under the influence of the three dispositions, they are not stable, even for an instant.

en.bdb: Coming in contact with the True Guru, they are brought under control; then, salvation and liberation are attained. ||3||
en.ms: Pleasing the True Guru man overpowers them and he them, attains deliverance and emancipation.
en.ssk: Coming in contact with the True Guru, they are brought under control; then, salvation and liberation are attained. ||3||

en.bdb: The One and Only Creator of the Universe is All-pervading everywhere. All shall once again merge into the One.
en.ms: The One Lord alone is pervading all over and everything shall merge in the One Lord ultimately.
en.ssk: The One and Only Creator of the Universe is All-pervading everywhere. All shall once again merge into the One.

verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਾਇ ਮਿਲੈ ਨਿਜ ਮਹਲੀ ਅਨਹਦ ਸਬਦੁ ਬਜਾਵੈਗੋ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: The Gurmukh goes and meets the Lord in His Mansion deep within; the Unstruck Word of the Shabad vibrates there. ||5||
en.ms: The pious person goes and meets the Lord in His mansion and then, for him, rings the celestial strain.
en.ssk: The Gurmukh goes and meets the Lord in His Mansion deep within; the Unstruck Word of the Shabad vibrates there. ||5||

es.sn: El Gurmukj va y encuentra al Señor en lo profundo de Su Mansión. La Palabra Inefable del Shabd vibra ahí. (5)

en.bdb: God created all the beings and creatures of the universe; He blesses the Gurmukh with glory.
en.ms: The Lord has created all the creatures and the world, but it is only through the Guru, that one is blessed with glory.
en.ssk: God created all the beings and creatures of the universe; He blesses the Gurmukh with glory.

es.sn: Dios creo a todos los seres y criaturas y al universo entero. Él bendice al Gurmukj con Gloria.

verse.unicode: ਬਿਨੁ ਗੁਰ ਭੇਟੇ ਕੋ ਮਹਲੁ ਨ ਪਾਵੈ ਆਇ ਜਾਇ ਦੁਖੁ ਪਾਵੈਗੋ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: Without meeting the Guru, no one obtains the Mansion of His Presence. They suffer the agony of coming and going in reincarnation. ||6||
en.ms: Without meeting with the Guru, one attains not the Lord's presence and suffers pain in coming and going.
en.ssk: Without meeting the Guru, no one obtains the Mansion of His Presence. They suffer the agony of coming and going in reincarnation. ||6||

es.sn: Sin conocer al Guru, nadie llega hasta la Mansión de Su Presencia y uno continúa sufriendo la agonía de ir y venir en las reencarnaciones. (6)

verse.gurmukhi: Anyk jnm ivCuVy myry pRIqm kir ikrpw gurU imlwvYgo ]
verse.unicode: ਅਨੇਕ ਜਨਮ ਵਿਛੁੜੇ ਮੇਰੇ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਮ ਕਰਿ ਕਿਰਪਾ ਗੁਰੂ ਮਿਲਾਵੈਗੋ ॥

en.bdb: For countless lifetimes, I have been separated from my Beloved; in His Mercy, the Guru has united me with Him.
en.ms: Since many births, I am separated from my Beloved Lord. Showing mercy, the Guru shall unite me with Him.
en.ssk: For countless lifetimes, I have been separated from my Beloved; in His Mercy, the Guru has united me with Him.

es.sn: He permanecido separado de mi Bienamado un incontable número de vidas, pero gracias a Su Misericordia, el Guru me unió a Su Ser.

en.bdb: Meeting the True Guru, I have found absolute peace, and my polluted intellect blossoms forth. ||7||
en.ms: Meeting with the True Guru, I have obtained supreme bliss and my soiled mind has blossomed.

en.bdb: The wandering mind wanders, roams and rambles in the ten directions; but the Guru holds it, and lovingly attunes it to the Lord.
en.ms: The mercurial mind roams and rambles in ten, yea ten directions, but, disciplined by the Guru, it is attuned to the Lord.
en.ssk: The wandering mind wanders, roams and rambles in the ten directions; but the Guru holds it, and lovingly attunes it to the Lord.

es.sn: La mente inestable vaga, merodea y deambula en las diez direcciones, pero el Guru la contiene y la entona amorosamente en el Señor.

en.ms: The True Guru installs the holy word in the man's mind and the Name-Nectar trickles into this mouth.
en.ssk: The True Guru implants the Word of the Shabad deep within the heart; the Ambrosial Naam, the Name of the Lord, trickles into the mouth. ||1||

en.bdb: The snakes are filled with poisonous venom; the Word of the Guru's Shabad is the antidote - place it in your mouth.
en.ms: Man is fully-filled with the serpent-like poison of sins but, the antidote of the Guru's word swallows them all.
en.ssk: The snakes are filled with poisonous venom; the Word of the Guru's Shabad is the antidote - place it in your mouth.

en.bdb: The dog of greed is very powerful in the village of the body; the Guru strikes it and drives it out in an instant.
en.ms: The dog of avarice is very powerful in the body abode, but the Guru smites and expels it in a moment.
en.ssk: The dog of greed is very powerful in the village of the body; the Guru strikes it and drives it out in an instant.

en.bdb: Truth, contentment, righteousness and Dharma have settled there; in the village of the Lord, sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord. ||3||
en.ms: The Guru enshrines truth, contentment and faith in the body abode and then man sings the Lord God's praises.
en.ssk: Truth, contentment, righteousness and Dharma have settled there; in the village of the Lord, sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord. ||3||

en.bdb: The mortal beings are sinking in the swamp of emotional attachment; the Guru lifts them up, and saves them from sinking.
en.ms: The mortal is sinking in the mire of worldly love and the Guru saves him from sinking.
en.ssk: The mortal beings are sinking in the swamp of emotional attachment; the Guru lifts them up, and saves them from sinking.

en.ms: When man repeating "Save me, save me" comes into the Guru's refuge, the Guru extends his hand and pulls him out.

en.bdb: The whole world is like a game in a dream, all a game. God plays and causes the game to be played.
en.ms: The whole world is like the game of a dream. The Lord, of Himself, causes the whole game and play to be played.
en.ssk: The whole world is like a game in a dream, all a game. God plays and causes the game to be played.

en.bdb: So earn the Profit of the Naam by following the Guru's Teachings; you shall go to the Court of the Lord in robes of honor. ||5||
en.ms: If man departs, reaping the Name's profit under the Guru's instruction, he goes to the Lord's court robed with glory.
en.ssk: So earn the Profit of the Naam by following the Guru's Teachings; you shall go to the Court of the Lord in robes of honor. ||5||

en.bdb: They act in egotism, and make others act in egotism; they collect and gather up the blackness of sin.
en.ms: In ego man acts, in ego he makes others act and thus brings and amasses he, the blackness of sins in ego.
en.ssk: They act in egotism, and make others act in egotism; they collect and gather up the blackness of sin.

es.sn: Y cuando la muerte les llega sufren agonía, pues tienen que comer lo que sembraron. (6)

verse.unicode: ਸੰਤਹੁ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮੁ ਧਨੁ ਸੰਚਹੁ ਲੈ ਖਰਚੁ ਚਲੇ ਪਤਿ ਪਾਵੈਗੋ ॥

en.bdb: O Saints, gather the Wealth of the Lord's Name; if you depart after packing these provisions, you shall be honored.
en.ms: O saints, amass the wealth of the Lord's Name; if ye depart by taking this viaticum, ye shall obtain honour.
en.ssk: O Saints, gather the Wealth of the Lord's Name; if you depart after packing these provisions, you shall be honored.

es.sn: Oh Santos, acumulen la Riqueza del Nombre del Señor, pues si parten, llevando consigo estas provisiones, serán honrados.

transliteration.english: sa(n)tahu raam naam dhan sa(n)chahu lai kharach chale pat paavaigo ||
transliteration.hindi: संतहु राम नामु धनु संचहु लै खरचु चले पति पावैगो ॥
transliteration.en: sa(n)tahu raam naam dhan sa(n)chahu lai kharach chale pat paavaigo ||
transliteration.hi: संतहु राम नामु धनु संचहु लै खरचु चले पति पावैगो ॥

transliteration.ur: سںتهُ رام نام دھن سںچهُ لَے کھرچ چلے پت پاوَےگو ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: Kwie Kric dyvih bhuqyrw hir dydy qoit n AwvYgo ]7]
verse.unicode: ਖਾਇ ਖਰਚਿ ਦੇਵਹਿ ਬਹੁਤੇਰਾ ਹਰਿ ਦੇਦੇ ਤੋਟਿ ਨ ਆਵੈਗੋ ॥੭॥

en.bdb: So eat, spend, consume and give abundantly; the Lord will give - there will be no deficiency. ||7||
en.ms: Eat, expend and bestow it abundantly and God will so give ye, that there shall be no deficiency.
en.ssk: So eat, spend, consume and give abundantly; the Lord will give - there will be no deficiency. ||7||

es.sn: Coman gastando, consumiendo, dando y compartiendo con abundancia, que el Señor seguirá dando y nunca habrá escasez. (7)

transliteration.ur: کھاا کھرچ دےوه بهُتےرا هر دےدے توٹ ن آوَےگو ۔۔۷۔۔

verse.unicode: ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮ ਧਨੁ ਹੈ ਰਿਦ ਅੰਤਰਿ ਧਨੁ ਗੁਰ ਸਰਣਾਈ ਪਾਵੈਗੋ ॥

en.bdb: The wealth of the Lord's Name is deep within the heart. In the Sanctuary of the Guru, this wealth is found.
en.ms: The wealth of the Lord's Name is within the mind, Seeking the Guru's refuge, ye shall obtain this wealth.
en.ssk: The wealth of the Lord's Name is deep within the heart. In the Sanctuary of the Guru, this wealth is found.

es.sn: La Riqueza del Nombre del Señor está en los profundo del corazón y en el Santuario del Guru es encontrada.

transliteration.ipa: rɑm nɑm t̪ən hæ rɪd̪ əŋt̪ər t̪ən Gʊr sərəɳɑei pɑʋæGɔ.

verse.gurmukhi: nwnk dieAw dieAw kir dInI duKu dwldu BMij smwvYgo ]8]5]
verse.unicode: ਨਾਨਕ ਦਇਆ ਦਇਆ ਕਰਿ ਦੀਨੀ ਦੁਖੁ ਦਾਲਦੁ ਭੰਜਿ ਸਮਾਵੈਗੋ ॥੮॥੫॥

en.bdb: O Nanak, God has been kind and compassionate; He has blessed me. Removing pain and poverty, He has blended me with Himself. ||8||5||
en.ms: Nanak, showing His mercy and compassion, the Lord has blest me with this wealth and removing my misery has blended me with Himself.
en.ssk: O Nanak, God has been kind and compassionate; He has blessed me. Removing pain and poverty, He has blended me with Himself. ||8||5||

es.sn: Oh, dice Nanak, Dios ha mostrado Su Bondad y Compasión. Bendiciéndome y removiendo mi dolor y pobreza, me ha unido a Su Ser. (8-5)

transliteration.english: naanak dhiaa dhiaa kar dheenee dhukh dhaaladh bha(n)j samaavaigo ||8||5||

ms.gurmukhi: s¤cy gurW dI bwxI SRySt bwxI hY[ gurW dI bwxI duAwrw nwm-suDwrs pRwpq huMdw hY[

es.sn: La Palabra del Verdadero Guru es la más sublime y noble. A través de Ella el Néctar Ambrosial es obtenido.

transliteration.english: satigur bachan bachan hai neeko gur bachanee a(n)mrit paavaigo ||
transliteration.hindi: सतिगुर बचनु बचनु है नीको गुर बचनी अंमृतु पावैगो ॥
transliteration.en: satigur bachan bachan hai neeko gur bachanee a(n)mrit paavaigo ||

transliteration.ur: ستگر بچن بچن هَے نیِکو گُر بچنیِ اںمرت پاوَےگو ۔۔

en.bdb: Ambreek the king was blessed with the status of immortality, meditating on the Word of the True Guru. ||2||
en.ms: Whosoever reflects on the Supreme True Guru's word, he is blessed with the immortal status like Amrik, the King.
en.ssk: Ambreek the king was blessed with the status of immortality, meditating on the Word of the True Guru. ||2||

ss.gurmukhi: (ijhVw BI mnu`K) gurU dw aucwirAw Sbd ihrdy ivc vsWdw hY (auh au~cw Awqmk jIvn pRwpq krdw hY) ijvyN AMbrIk ny auh Awqmk drjw hwsl kr ilAw ij`Qy Awqmk mOq poh nhIN skdI [2[

es.sn: Ambrik, el rey, fue bendecido con la Inmortalidad, meditando en la Palabra del Verdadero Guru. (2)

transliteration.english: jiau a(n)bareek amaraa padh paae satigur mukh bachan dhiaavaigo ||2||
transliteration.hindi: जिउ अंबरीकि अमरा पद पाए सतिगुर मुख बचन धिआवैगो ॥२॥

transliteration.ur: جِا اںبریِک امرا پد پااے ستگر مُکھ بچن دھآوَےگو ۔۔۲۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: siqgur srin srin min BweI suDw suDw kir iDAwvYgo ]
verse.unicode: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਰਨਿ ਸਰਨਿ ਮਨਿ ਭਾਈ ਸੁਧਾ ਸੁਧਾ ਕਰਿ ਧਿਆਵੈਗੋ ॥

en.bdb: The Sanctuary, the Protection and Sanctuary of the True Guru is pleasing to the mind. It is sacred and pure - meditate on it.
en.ms: The True Guru's refuge, yea, his refuge is pleasing to my mind. Deeming the Name-Nectar immaculate, meditate I on it.
en.ssk: The Sanctuary, the Protection and Sanctuary of the True Guru is pleasing to the mind. It is sacred and pure - meditate on it.

es.sn: El Santuario, junto con la Protección del Verdadero Guru, está complaciendo a la mente;

transliteration.english: satigur saran saran man bhaiee sudhaa sudhaa kar dhiaavaigo ||
transliteration.hindi: सतिगुर सरनि सरनि मनि भाई सुधा सुधा करि धिआवैगो ॥
transliteration.en: satigur saran saran man bhaiee sudhaa sudhaa kar dhiaavaigo ||

en.bdb: The True Guru has become Merciful to the meek and the poor; He has shown me the Path, the Way to the Lord. ||3||
en.ms: The True Guru has become merciful unto me, the meek one and he has shown me the way and path of God.
en.ssk: The True Guru has become Merciful to the meek and the poor; He has shown me the Path, the Way to the Lord. ||3||

es.sn: es Sagrado y Puro, medita en Él. El Verdadero Guru mostró Su Misericordia al pobre y desvalido. Él me ha mostrado el Camino al Señor. (3)

en.bdb: Those who enter the Sanctuary of the True Guru are firmly established; God comes to protect them.
en.ms: They, who enter the sanctuary of the True Guru, are blessed with glory and the Lord comes to protect them.
en.ssk: Those who enter the Sanctuary of the True Guru are firmly established; God comes to protect them.

es.sn: Quienes entran en el Santuario del Verdadero Guru se encuentran firmemente estables y Dios les da Su Protección.

en.bdb: In the Image of the Lord, Har, Har, one becomes the Embodiment of the Lord. The Lord makes His humble servant worthy of worship. ||6||

en.bdb: There are nine doors, but the taste of these nine doors is bland and insipid. The Essence of Ambrosial Nectar trickles down through the Tenth Door.
en.ms: The body has nine doors but insipid is the relish of all the nine doors. It is in the tenth one, that the immortalising Nectar trickles.
en.ssk: There are nine doors, but the taste of these nine doors is bland and insipid. The Essence of Ambrosial Nectar trickles down through the Tenth Door.

en.bdb: Everyone longs for paradise, liberation and heaven; all place their hopes in them.
en.ms: Everyone longs for paradise emancipation and elysium and ever rests all his hopes on them.
en.ssk: Everyone longs for paradise, liberation and heaven; all place their hopes in them.

en.bdb: The humble long for the Blessed Vision of His Darshan; they do not ask for liberation. Their minds are satisfied and comforted by His Darshan. ||1||
en.ms: The Persons desirous of the God's vision ask not for emancipation. Obtaining His vision, their soul is satiated and comforted.
en.ssk: The humble long for the Blessed Vision of His Darshan; they do not ask for liberation. Their minds are satisfied and comforted by His Darshan. ||1||

en.ssk: The minds of all the beings and creatures of the world waver unsteadily.

en.bdb: Please take pity on them, be merciful to them, and unite them with the Holy; establish this support to support the world. ||1||
en.ms: O Lord, mercifully and compassionately, unite Thou them with the saints and thus support the world, by giving them the support.

en.bdb: The earth is beneath us, and yet its dust falls down on all; let yourself be covered by the dust of the feet of the Holy.
en.ms: The dust is beneath the feet of all and, from beneath, it falls over all. Roll thou, therefore, in the dust of the saints feet.
en.ssk: The earth is beneath us, and yet its dust falls down on all; let yourself be covered by the dust of the feet of the Holy.

en.bdb: The Gurmukhs are blessed with the Divine Light of the Lord; Maya comes to serve them.
en.ms: The Guru-ward is blessed with the Lord's blessed and sublime light and the mammon comes and pays obeisance to him.
en.ssk: The Gurmukhs are blessed with the Divine Light of the Lord; Maya comes to serve them.

en.bdb: Through the Word of the Guru's Teachings, they bite with teeth of wax and chew iron, drinking in the Sublime Essence of the Lord. ||3||
en.ms: By the Guru's word, he cuts the teeth of wax (of compassion), bites and chews the hard iron(sin)and thiswise in-drinks the God's elixir.
en.ssk: Through the Word of the Guru's Teachings, they bite with teeth of wax and chew iron, drinking in the Sublime Essence of the Lord. ||3||

en.ms: The Lord God has shown great mercy unto me and I have met with the Guru, the saintly person.
en.ssk: The Lord has shown great mercy, and bestowed His Name; I have met with the Holy Guru, the Primal Being.

en.ms: The praises of the Lord's Name, I have spread all around and the Lord has blessed me with glory all the world over.
en.ssk: The Glorious Praises of the Lord's Name have spread out everywhere; the Lord bestows fame all over the world. ||4||

en.bdb: The powerful fire of corruption is raging violently within; the Word of the Guru's Shabad is the ice water which cools and soothes.
en.ms: Within me is greatly raging the war of sins. O my Lord, bless Thou me with the icy-cold Guru's word, that it may be quenched.
en.ssk: The powerful fire of corruption is raging violently within; the Word of the Guru's Shabad is the ice water which cools and soothes.

en.bdb: Some are standing, parched and shrivelled up by their doubts; joining the Saadh Sangat, they are rejuvenated.
en.ms: They, who are parched by doubt are thoroughly dried up while standing. Meeting with the society of saints they blossom forth again.
en.ssk: Some are standing, parched and shrivelled up by their doubts; joining the Saadh Sangat, they are rejuvenated.

verse.gurmukhi: AigAwnu AMDyru mhw pMQu ibKVw AhMkwir Bwir lid lIjY ]7]
verse.unicode: ਅਗਿਆਨੁ ਅੰਧੇਰੁ ਮਹਾ ਪੰਥੁ ਬਿਖੜਾ ਅਹੰਕਾਰਿ ਭਾਰਿ ਲਦਿ ਲੀਜੈ ॥੭॥

en.bdb: The path of ignorance and darkness is utterly treacherous; they are loaded down with the crushing load of egotism. ||7||
en.ms: Exceedingly gloomy and arduous is the path of spiritual ignorance and the mortal is loaded with the heavy load of self-conceit.
en.ssk: The path of ignorance and darkness is utterly treacherous; they are loaded down with the crushing load of egotism. ||7||

ss.gurmukhi: (Aijhy mnu`K vwsqy) Awqmk jIvn vloN by-smJI iek Gu`p hnyrw (bx jWdw hY, aus mnu`K vwsqy izMdgI dw) rsqw AOKw ho jWdw hY (ikauNik auh mnu`K) AhMkwr (-rUp) Bwr nwl (sdw) l`idAw rihMdw hY [7[
ss.unicode: (ਅਜਿਹੇ ਮਨੁੱਖ ਵਾਸਤੇ) ਆਤਮਕ ਜੀਵਨ ਵਲੋਂ ਬੇ-ਸਮਝੀ ਇਕ ਘੁੱਪ ਹਨੇਰਾ (ਬਣ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਹੈ, ਉਸ ਮਨੁੱਖ ਵਾਸਤੇ ਜ਼ਿੰਦਗੀ ਦਾ) ਰਸਤਾ ਔਖਾ ਹੋ ਜਾਂਦਾ ਹੈ (ਕਿਉਂਕਿ ਉਹ ਮਨੁੱਖ) ਅਹੰਕਾਰ (-ਰੂਪ) ਭਾਰ ਨਾਲ (ਸਦਾ) ਲੱਦਿਆ ਰਹਿੰਦਾ ਹੈ ।੭।

ft.gurmukhi: iqn ky AMqhkrx myN AigAwn rUpI mhW AMDyrw ho rhw hY AOr Agy jm kw pMQ kTn hY iqs myN clnw hoqw hY, punw hMkwr kr pwp rUpI Bwr lwd lIAw ]7]
ft.unicode: ਤਿਨ ਕੇ ਅੰਤਹਕਰਣ ਮੇਂ ਅਗਿਆਨ ਰੂਪੀ ਮਹਾਂ ਅੰਧੇਰਾ ਹੋ ਰਹਾ ਹੈ ਔਰ ਅਗੇ ਜਮ ਕਾ ਪੰਥ ਕਠਨ ਹੈ ਤਿਸ ਮੇਂ ਚਲਨਾ ਹੋਤਾ ਹੈ, ਪੁਨਾ ਹੰਕਾਰ ਕਰ ਪਾਪ ਰੂਪੀ ਭਾਰ ਲਾਦ ਲੀਆ ॥੭॥

ms.gurmukhi: AiqAMq hI AnHyrw Aqy kTn hY, Awqmk bysmJI dw mwrg Aqy pRwxI ny svY-hMgqw dw Bwrw boJ bwr kIqw hoieAw hY[
ms.unicode: ਅਤਿਅੰਤ ਹੀ ਅਨ੍ਹੇਰਾ ਅਤੇ ਕਠਨ ਹੈ, ਆਤਮਕ ਬੇਸਮਝੀ ਦਾ ਮਾਰਗ ਅਤੇ ਪ੍ਰਾਣੀ ਨੇ ਸਵੈ-ਹੰਗਤਾ ਦਾ ਭਾਰਾ ਬੋਝ ਬਾਰ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ।

es.sn: El sendero de la ignorancia y de la oscuridad es totalmente traicionero, y ahí se les ve cargados del insoportable peso del egoísmo.

transliteration.hindi: अगिआनु अंधेरु महा पंथु बिखड़ा अहंकारि भारि लदि लीजै ॥७॥

verse.unicode: ਨਾਨਕ ਰਾਮ ਰਮ ਰਮੁ ਰਮ ਰਮ ਰਾਮੈ ਤੇ ਗਤਿ ਕੀਜੈ ॥

en.bdb: O Nanak, chanting the Name of the Lord, the All-pervading Lord, one is emancipated.
en.ms: Nanak, the Beauteous Lord is pervading all over, Uttering, and reciting the Lord's Name, one is emancipated.
en.ssk: O Nanak, chanting the Name of the Lord, the All-pervading Lord, one is emancipated.

es.sn: Oh, dice Nanak, cantando el Nombre del Señor, del Señor Todo Prevaleciente, uno es emancipado.

verse.gurmukhi: siqguru imlY qw nwmu idRVwey rwm nwmY rlY imlIjY ]8]6]
verse.unicode: ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਤਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਦ੍ਰਿੜਾਏ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮੈ ਰਲੈ ਮਿਲੀਜੈ ॥੮॥੬॥

en.bdb: Meeting the True Guru, the Naam is implanted within; we are united and blended with the Lord's Name. ||8||6||
en.ms: If the True Guru meets, then, enshrines he, the Name within the man's and he unites within the man's mind and he unites and meets with the Lord's Name.
en.ssk: Meeting the True Guru, the Naam is implanted within; we are united and blended with the Lord's Name. ||8||6|| First Set of Six||

es.sn: Encontrando al Guru Verdadero, el Naam es implantado en el interior y así somos unidos y fundidos en el Nombre del Señor. (8-6)
